channel.title: C.H.U.N.X. - Chunky Hallucenigetic Universe Neutralized bloX
channel.description:
[size=24pt][font=arial]Game has been Rewrote![/font][/size] It has been a long time, since this is a new year, I've decided to set a new goal. Previously, I have been gaining some progress on CHUNX, however, it was quite messy. Sometimes the information gets screwed up and it was just a total mess. So I've decided to change that this year. CHUNX will be the game of the year. I will be working on it for this year, and perhaps a little bit of the next. Everything has been revolutionized. Don't forget, I still post updates about my game (including timelapses) on YouTube: www.youtube.com/user/MrDeathJockey
Here are a few timelapses:
[size=18pt]TIMELAPSE 1 - ENGINE, WORLD:[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uH7NYU3bAOg
[size=18pt]TIMELAPSE 2 - SAVING:[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ttkoL0e9Mkk
[size=18]TIMELAPSE 3 - PLAYER, TREE GEN, BUG FIX[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=39Y_8NNx2ig
[size=18pt]TIMELAPSE 4 - DEBUG SCREEN, MORE BUG FIX:[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p89JE-i9hCg
[size=18pt]TIMELAPSE 5 - MENU, LOGO, BUTTONS:[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P2j8UgVV0KU
[size=18pt]TIMELAPSE 6 - INVENTORY, STATUS BAR ETC:[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QQQop678uoM
Stay tuned for later updates :D
